Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters

Filters to normalise tokens within a tokenised sentence, e.g.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TokenFilter
    A filter for applying a given transformation to a sentence that has been tokenised.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiacriticRemover
    Removes all diacritics from text.
    LowercaseFilter
    Puts text in lower case.
    LowercaseKnownFirstWordFilter
    Transforms a word into lower-case if it is a known word in the lexicon, and if it is at the start of a sentence or immediately following any punctuation mark except those in LowercaseKnownFirstWordFilter.noUppercasePunctuationRegex.
    LowercaseKnownWordFilter
    Transforms a word with at least an initial uppercase letter into lower-case as long as it is a known word in the lexicon.
    QuoteNormaliser
    Normalises all unicode characters representing some sort of double quote to simple double quote, some sort of single quote to a simple apostrophe, and some sort of dash or hyphen to a simple minus sign.
    UppercaseSeriesFilter
    Looks for a series of 2+ words in all upper-case, and transforms them into lower-case.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters Description

Filters to normalise tokens within a tokenised sentence, e.g. to lowercase the tokens.
Author:
Assaf Urieli
